content: take your favorite blanket stitch out of the living room with the corner to corner scarf worked on the diagonal this scarf will be a classic **finished measurements** width 7¾ length 60 **materials** premier® yarns sweet roll® 100% acrylic 140g/245yds #1047-38 pansy pop 2 balls hook us size h-8 5mm crochet hook notions tapestry needle **gauge** 3½ blocks x 3½ row = 4 in corner-to-corner stitch measured on the diagonal each block measures about ¾ square save time check your gauge
